BREAKING NEWS

Curfew in Seattle starting at 5 p.m. Saturday and Sunday in response to downtown protests

Updated 9:35 pm

LiveDeath of George Floyd sparks protests on Seattle streets

Floyd was a Black Minneapolis man who died after a white police officer pressed his knee into Floyd's neck for almost eight minutes, ignoring the man's pleas that he was suffocating. In downtown Seattle, police struggled to disperse a crowd, leading Seattle Mayor Jenny Durkan to enact a 5 p.m. curfew.

  • Inslee activates National Guard in response to ongoing Seattle protests
  • Mayor Jenny Durkan announces curfew from 5 p.m. to 5 a.m.
